website_summaries.verdict: Embracing the brand’s principle, here comes another comfortable sneaker approved by the PDAC for diabetics in the name of Hush Puppies Gus. It offers such comfort that lets you feel as if you are walking on clouds. Whether for prolonged walking or standing, this shoe will take care of your tired feet.Light as a feather, the Hush Puppies Gus is suitable for people with neuropathy and other foot issues. It provides arch support, too. With uncompromised style and versatility, it is perfect for casual and business wear.
pros: A significant number of reviewers have stated that the Hush Puppies Gus provides supreme comfort perfect for prolonged standing or walking
This lace-up sneaker is surprisingly lightweight as a feather, according to many users
Plenty of people with flat feet have testified that it offers much support compared to Vans sneakers
The Hush Puppies Gus has a stylish and versatile design that can excellently match casual and dressy outfits, as per a lot of customers
A handful of buyers have noted that it is among the Hush Puppies shoes that are recommended to people with neuropathy and other foot issues
This men’s casual sneaker has a good quality upper which does not scuff easily, as several testers have pointed out
Some purchasers have expressed that the low-top Gus is well-worth for their money
cons: A few have mentioned that the low-top Hush Puppies Gus runs larger than expected
The sole is so soft that it wears faster than others on rough surfaces, according to a couple of users
A couple of clients with narrow feet have mentioned that this shoe fits a tad big or wide for them

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Shoes that blister your toes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes literally made the most noise from squeaking sounds of any shoes or boots I've ever owned! They look solid and well made, but they don't sound that way or they wouldn't squeak. I also found the toebox to be just a bit narrow, causing my outside toes to want to callus or blister. Despite how nice they look, these shoes are being donated.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great as always!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned probably a dozen or more pair of this particular shoe, my only complaint is that they wear out in about 8 months of hard wear. This is probably due to my weight and the fact that the soft soul is what makes them so comfortable. They are consistently sized and very well made, I replace the insole with a Dr. Scholls which has more arch support, the insole last through 2 to 3 pair of shoes. The factory insole is fine, I just have a very high arch and require something extra. I would recommend them to anyone who spends a lot of time on their feet.
customer_reviews.author: SteveB1608

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome new shoes! Comfortable, stylish, and easy-to-wear. The fit is superb, especially since the effects of gravity have apparently caused my feet to widen. Plenty of room for toes, heels and all the other parts in these shoes! They are also light as can be considering they appear to be large and clunky. Not so! The soles are thick and the shoe sturdy and well-made, but, still, light as a feather!
customer_reviews.author: Edward M Stumpf

customer_reviews.title: Super lite and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are like wearing nothing at all. Very lite and comfortable for my Fred Flinstone extra wide feet. They look nice, but honestly they look very lite weight and may not stand the test of time. I won't use them for everyday use. They stay in my office to walk on the concrete floors. If they last 6+ months, I'd be thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: Real leather comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable leather shoes. To those reviewers who claimed the upper was fake leather, they are incorrect. They are even marked as real leather. The international symbol for leather is used on the tongue of the shoe. There is a picture of a symbolic cow hide with an arrow pointing to the upper part of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tom O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe for My Dad
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad who has a difficult time finding shoes wide enough for his feet. I have returned more shoes than I've been able to purchase for him. These have been the best fitting shoes that he has had in a very long time. He says that they are comfortable, wide enough, and the right weight for him. He wears them everywhere. Thanks for such a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: S. Chizmadia

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was wanted, with perfect fit and super comfort
customer_reviews.text: This pair is the second pair (the others are brown) of this Gus Oxford shoe we've ordered. This pair is semi-dressy in appearance. My spousal unit is VERY happy with these Hush Puppies because they are both nice looking and very comfortable. We both liked the reasonable price (beats the $200 he was formerly paying for another similar brand!). These are great casual shoes--when sneakers just don't "cut it"--that he can wear for hours.
customer_reviews.author: nvr2amzd

customer_reviews.title: Super Light and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of these shoes in Brown and in Black. They are super light and comfortable. I normally don't use "dress" type shoes that often, but these work and look good in casual slacks and also if I were to wear a suit. Because they have soft foam rubber soles, they do wear out much quicker than leather or sneaker like rubber soles. These also could get a bit slippery on some surfaces.especially when the soles wear down and have less grip. Even with the couple things I mentioned, I still give them 5 Stars because they are so light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tj4fa

customer_reviews.title: I just can't understand how these wide EE shoes were so tight.  I'll try EEE
customer_reviews.text: These look good and I liked the look of them, but just didn't fit well at all,. Ordered these shoes in 10.5 EE (wide), but had some problems with them. The length was as expected (good). The shoes were too narrow and so particularly uncomfortable. I'm returning them for a wider (EEE) size) Normally 2E width shoes fit my feet well. I didn't see comments that these shoes ran narrow; in fact reviews from 2013 said that these "give extra room in the instep and toe area". I just can't understand how these 10.5 wide EE shoes were so tight.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these I have purchased. They are very lightweight and comfortable. They only last about a year or so if you wear them daily. The soles are fairly soft and tend to wear out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: John Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, laces are junk!
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE*** Soles wore out quicker than I expected. Although they're still comfortable, I can barely walk in rain while wearing these, or else I'll slip and slide around. Good shoes for occasional use, but won't last long if worn everyday, even in an office environment. Good shoes. Very light and comfortable. Only issue is that the shoelaces are junk! It doesn't take them long to rip and need replacement. Other than that, the shoes fit well and are holding up great! I'll probably buy another pair - but I'll just replace the laces first this time!
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Took the money and ran
customer_reviews.text: These soft leather top shoes fit exactly as expected. I found mine Immediately comfortable. I plan to wear them as a light work shoe, I will also use them as an occasional casual shoe. The white is just a little off white. The big problem was I ordered two more pairs and after taking the money they closed up shop. Other people did not receive their orders either however no assistance was ever offered.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: The Gus is the Best
customer_reviews.text: Every positive review of this shoe on two sites were correct - this is one very comfortable shoe! Well made and attractive. The "Gus" will make me look at other styles of Hush Puppies for the first time in decades. BTW: Love the new Amazon "locker" at Whole Foods! Amazon "zapped" the other guys with a great price and fast service.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Krantz

customer_reviews.title: THE SPORT WHITE IS ACTUALLY GREEN TINTED!!! BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: The "sport white" color pictures are the same as the regular "white" color's pictures, making them the WRONG PICTURES. The shoes, rather than just being off-white or cream colored, are slightly tinted with a yellow-green. They don't really go with anything and I'm seriously considering returning them despite them being in my size 15-wide and relatively good price. The shoe itself is great (4-5 stars) minus 1-2 for the misleading pictures and color on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: B-rizzle

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in Amazon
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes, however, These did not fit and I sent them back via UPS, I have my return receipt from UPS but Amazon never Credited the account I used to purchase them. I cannot get a hold of Amazon through chat or their 800 number and I have no idea what to do at this point because I paid for them, I returned them and I’m not showing any credit to the account I charged them on. Amazon, you need to make yourself more available, this is been going on for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly G.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about these shoes. I dress a business casual everyday and I wanted something with good comfort. I thought these would fit the bill, but I was disappointed. First, they are not attractive. They look like mall walker shoes. I wear a button up long sleeve shirt with no tie most days and these just don't work. Second, they are not comfortable. The main reason I bought these was for extra comfort, but these feel stiff and don't offer support. They are light, but not comfortable. Spend 20 dollars more and get a better quality pair.
customer_reviews.author: andync77

customer_reviews.title: I returned these within three hours. Soles are a ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned these within three hours. Soles are a hard plastic, not rubberized by any stretch of the imagination. Shoes look very plastic. Not even a leather-like appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J.

customer_reviews.title: good fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these shoes before so I knew they would be perfect for me. The last pair I bought lasted 2 years which I think is good considering I am rough on shoes. The fit is perfect for me. I have diabetes and often have swollen feet. I did have to buy 1/2 size larger but that is because of my swollen feet. I wear a 3E and these fit well. The shoes are comfortable and give me good support. I wear them for work and as casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fugett

customer_reviews.title: Hush Puppies Gus
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style of the shoe but it has absolutely no arch support at all. I tried to put my orthotic insert in the shoe but that didn't work because the shoe has low sides and low heel flap. If you have any need for arch support, these are not for you. If you're flat footed, they would be great because the supplied insert is flat as a pancake. The shoes are light weight, I'll give them that. I'd be leary as to their durability.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Good 'ole Gus
customer_reviews.text: I have always like Hush Puppies, these shoes continue the tradition. They were comfortable out of the box and remain the same several weeks later. The suede finish is durable, soles "cushiony", but the shoe laces began fraying after several weeks of wear. Other than the laces, these shoes are everything I anticipated. I recommend the Gus Oxford shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: The best dress shoe EVER
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable dress shoe I've ever owned they are extremely light weight not heavy so you don't feel like you're lugging around 20 pounds of bricks they are very attractive and sleek. I recommend them to anybody that has the look nice feel good and know they're going to get a dependable shoe with extreme comfort
customer_reviews.author: Threepercenter

customer_reviews.title: Usually they are really good quality but some how this one came faulty
customer_reviews.text: Usually they are really good quality but some how this one came faulty, they didn't even fit... i was even thinking they could be an outlet piece
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Leyva

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the first time. My son wore it too big and bought another pair. This time is very suitable
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: not very nice
customer_reviews.text: fits as expected cheap looking shoe,plastic looking ,glad I will only be wearing only now and then,if this is leather like it said,then that was one poor cow!.will not buy again 70.00 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son will only wear hush puppies Shoes. So I ordered these for him in brown. I ordered them in a wide size. They were a bit tight but after he wore them for a few days they loosened up. He is still wearing them after about 10 months. He wears them for work so that's 4 days a week , 8 hours a day. These shoes have really held up.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Adams

customer_reviews.title: My dad's favorite
customer_reviews.text: He had hard to fit shoes so I always ordered these for him. A bit pricey, but he was a hard to fit and these worked for him.
customer_reviews.author: NYB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight, stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair; I wore out the first pair. I love the extra width. Very comfortable, lightweight, yet stylish.
customer_reviews.author: VaRedSoxFan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing HP Gus shoes for years; love them. Now with the HP outlet stores gone, at least Amazon can get them for me quickly.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON PURCHASER

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bad Leather - if it is a leather...!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using same brand and company for 10 years. This time leather is not good at all. More or less it looks and feel like a vinyl-plastic. Hard and rough. Leather would be soft and easy but not this shoes. Bad Part can not return it either. Too bad Hush Puppies would produce such bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: ajit desai

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this online, except that I've been buying this particular brand and model of shoes for a while, so basically, I knew what to expect. I am curious about other hush puppies model, but I would rather visit a store and try them on first. That being said, the GUS Oxford's are truly at the top of my list in terms of comfort. I kinda wished they lasted longer, I usually go through a pair in about 3 to 4 yrs, but I use them extensively. But at the online price, I'm really laughing! :)
customer_reviews.author: Claude Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Bought these 5 AND 10 years ago.  That's how much I love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Like my heading says. Bought these 5 AND 10 years ago. That's how much I love these!! and plan on buying them again right now. Yes I am that crazy but once I find something I like...I stick with it......forever!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful to find the extra wide sizing needed!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased with his shoes. He has worn this type before and has been happy with them. Even though the arch support is not satisfactory, he overcomes this issue with an orthotic insert - bad feet is all it is! But pleased that he was able to find these online as the local stores don't seem to carry a full line of them with the needed sizing. Will certainly by them again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wasser

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, but not suited for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 14W or 14EE (extra wide). These shoes run long, but don't feel any wider than a regular pair of shoes. It's taken me a long time to break them in, as I typically get blisters on the outsides of my big toes and on my heels after walking in them for just a few hours. I know I wouldn't be able to wear them comfortably for an entire day, but maybe they'll break in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Hush Puppies always very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved these shoes they're always very comfortable with a minimum soreness to the foot when new and of course they did not disappoint. Unlike that horrible Rockford branch that falls apart , peels, in 3 months Hush Puppies last
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: an OK shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have two problems: 1, the leather is thicker than normal hush puppies shoes and a lot stiffer The shoe strings are terrible- they come undone by themselves. I replace the shoe strings !
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog

customer_reviews.title: 3rd time to get these
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a pair of these in a store a number of years ago. At the time I was having a problem with plantar fasciitis in my right heel, but after wearing these for a few months the pain went away. When they wore out I found a pair online and ordered them, plus a black pair, and now I've ordered this brown and a black pair again. I hope they never quit making them. I wear these to work, which is a "business casual" dress environment.
customer_reviews.author: Alan P. LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Confort at best !
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Hush Puppies for the past twenty years. This model "Gus" is my favorite, very comfortable and the material quality is still very good. Very little variation throughout the years. (I believe they are now manufactured in China). Quality and comfort always exceed expectations. I used to buy them at JCP but through Amazon I get better deals. Nothing fancy here, simply good shoes for the money. Excellent for traveling, long walks or standing.
customer_reviews.author: Heri

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, looks good, fits great
customer_reviews.text: I reall Like these, except the soles are really stiff when new. Even months later they are still stiff, but better. My previous pair had soles that were not nearly as stiff as these were initially.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes...
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble (locally) finding shoes that fit. I went to a boot shop to have my foot measured then allowed that measurement to guide me in buying these shoes. They fit GREAT!! They are ULTRA lightweight. I wish there was a little more arch support but inserts can help with that. They were not that expensive and they are really comfortable. I have only had them a week so I cannot speak to durability--but if I limit them to sporadic wear I am hopeful that they will last at least a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: High Value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this shoe since 2007. Perfect fit everytime. No breakin required...put them on and start walking. Very great value for the price paid. Just hope they are still available in four more years.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Adcock

customer_reviews.title: Hush Puppies Gus Oxford, Tan
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very light and comfortable. They are so comfortable its almost like not wearing shoes at all. So far I just love them. Reasonably priced and sharp looking too boot! I want to order a couple more pairs but will hold off on that for a while and see how these hold up over some time. If they hold up well---I will be ordering a couple more pairs for sure. I truly hope they hold up because I like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkmarina

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfortable for me allowing me to walk about all day. The only change I have done on the other two pairs is to add a no tie shoe laces.
customer_reviews.author: OldnGray

customer_reviews.title: Good product worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm very particular about how much money I spend on shoes. They are way too expensive in most cases. These shoes, however, while pricey, are worth the money! I bought a pair over a year ago, wore them absolutely every day without fail, and they're still going strong. This second pair is back-up, because sooner or later I'll need to replace the current pair. But right now, the old ones are still going strong, well over a year later. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Squeaks Loud As
customer_reviews.text: Returning the shoe because the sole squeaks like no shoe I have ever worn before
customer_reviews.author: Salman Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for wide feet. Was having trouble after surgery finding a foot with lower back clearance and width for my swollen foot. This is perfect for something more like a dress shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable even for all-day wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically because another reviewer said they have no arch support. I have flat feet, and arch supports hurt. A nice flat footbed works for me. These shoes are very lightweight and that means very little padding inside - a Dr. School's foam liner solved the problem without compromising the extra room I need. These are great shoes for the price - handsome and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: horselips

customer_reviews.title: These are my husbands favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are my husbands favorite shoes...he works 12+ a day and wears them comfortably. He is a 9EE and normally we have to get a size wider just to fit his foot. However, the 92E fits perfectly! I've ordered nearly every color and material they have in the GUS and will continue to do so. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: K. Ledford

customer_reviews.title: ... and that's what the fit applet for this item recommended. These shoes run small out of the box ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn size 8s and that's what the fit applet for this item recommended. These shoes run small out of the box but the leather is soft enough to expand after a day or so. My feet hurt the first day I wore them but now the shoes are only snug. I would recommend buying a half size larger. Still a good shoe that is very light, as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: L. E. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Too Short
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was fine and I would have kept it but it was too small. Been buying shoes online for a number of years and this is the first that didn't fit. It's also the first of the Hush Puppies brand I ordered. Can't say if the all run small. Happy free returns were part of the purchase. My size is 13D (medium).
customer_reviews.author: Narcosleepy

customer_reviews.title: ... thought they were supposed to be amongst the most comfortable out there
customer_reviews.text: My first Hush Puppies and I thought they were supposed to be amongst the most comfortable out there. That is not the case with these. They're kind of hard. Even after like 3 weeks of breaking in, they do feel better but not soft.
customer_reviews.author: EddieAmazonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these great, comfortable shoes. I loved the first pair so much that I wore them out. Comfort, support, and able to be worn for business or when going casual — what’s not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Kijewski

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are made of a material that probably wouldn't hold up but for a short time. The shoe looked glued together, not stitched. They have absolutely no arch support. They have a totally flat bottom so you would have to purchase an insert. I gave them a 2 for looks, the sizing was correct and they were light weight. They definitely are not a work shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Toots50

customer_reviews.title: fits well
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar pair already, and bought these because I was happy with them. I'm very pleased with the new ones, too.
customer_reviews.author: TheEE

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes !
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn in my nearly 70 years. They are feather light but very durable. I do a lot of walking for exercise and wore the soles through before the uppers. They are made in China but are very high quality construction. I keep two pair on hand, one for everyday and one for casual dress. Also very good is the sub $100 price.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Walker

customer_reviews.title: Bam..
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these for years. I wear the 3 Es.... but generally wear a 4E. The soles are a little soft and wear worse than they did a few years ago.... but you can't beat these for comfort. They are the lightest shoe that have every worn. The main reason I buy them. I generally wore Rockport pro walkers before these. The Rockports wear longer but are twice the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sundance

customer_reviews.title: They're not like walking on clouds or anything but they're a fine ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered expensive Rockports, mid-priced Reeboks and these cheaper Hush Puppies at the same time and these are the ones that became my regular shoes. They're not like walking on clouds or anything but they're a fine shoe for the price and I like the suede look of them. Think I'm going to swap out the shoelaces for ones with a little color though.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Second time I have bought this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Looks great!! Bought the same shoe again after a few years.
customer_reviews.author: M Edward Nieland

customer_reviews.title: OK - Very Overpriced - Bad Laces
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are just OK. The main problem is that they are extremely overpriced. These shoes should be about $30. They also have possibly the worst shoelaces I've ever owned. The laces come untied all by themselves several times a day even when double knotted. It has something to do with the stuffing inside of the laces. If they were $30 something I wouldn't have minded so much but I feel a little ripped off. I will be buying a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: RobZilla

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair too tight!
customer_reviews.text: Watch the sizing. I had a pair that were 5 stars, so I did a reorder from "my orders". however the next pair were a lot tighter. other wise a good light weight shoe.
customer_reviews.author: da cap10

customer_reviews.title: Tight width
customer_reviews.text: Usually, a 9 fits perfect. Had to change them out for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mei

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, sturdy shoe
customer_reviews.text: A tiny bit large, but perhaps as they age I’ll be able to lace them a little tighter if the uppers give way. Very comfy - a little wider than I expected. They look real good!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: hushpuppy shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were very nice, but had to return them. T hey were too small across the top of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Durell Rochester

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Initially very stiff, but I expect them to soften up as I break them in. Very light weight and they look very good. Not as much cushioning on the insole as I expected from Hush Puppies, so I'll probably get some inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H Thomas Jr

customer_reviews.title: This pair fits MUCH better than the 10W I purchased previously
customer_reviews.text: This pair fits MUCH better than the 10W I purchased previously. That pair was European Size 43, which is American Size 9 1/2. That was a completely wasted purchase! I've stopped wearing them as they were MUCH TOO TIGHT. American Size 10 is 43 1/2. The size 44 I received this time is a much better match for my feet...slightly big for my right foot and a perfect match for my left foot. I hope the soles will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes going!
customer_reviews.text: I've never been disappointed by the many Hush Puppies shoes I've worn over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe:  period !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sixty three years old and I will have to say these Hush Puppies Gun Oxford shoes are light weigh and very comfortable . this is the best feeling shoe I ever had on my feet in the sixty three years I have been on earth. it's almost like going bare footed but with the comfort of having a shoe on. Be good to your feet and purchase some Hush Puppies .
customer_reviews.author: Plow Boy

customer_reviews.title: Not the original liners
customer_reviews.text: Terrible Liners. The liners had been cut by hand and were obviously not made by Hush Puppies. Why would Amazon sell a shoe product that obviously is lacking the original materials? The inserts I received were obviously tampered with, probably bought from Walmart, and trimmed for the shoes. I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I think I can work with these and get them to fit my feet better. I deeply appreciate you taking care of my ...
customer_reviews.text: the leather uppers is much harder than others i,ve used. I use hush puppies due to me being cripled. I need the lightest in weight shoes that i can find. I have a pair or two of the nunn bush, which is really soft. I think I can work with these and get them to fit my feet better. I deeply appreciate you taking care of my needs, and being so fast to ship my order to me. Lords willing, I'll be ordering more in the future. Again, thank you for your great service. Clifford Allen
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks great and extremely lightweight! Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks great and extremely lightweight! Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and light on the feet shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and the light feel on my feet. I would like more arch support and that is the reason for four stars. If I didn't benefit from arch support, I would have given these shoes five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Robert Carter

customer_reviews.title: They are night and day more comfortable than any other shoes besides Merril(which I wear in ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for a part-time job as an usher where I stand for 6-7 hours a day. They are night and day more comfortable than any other shoes besides Merril(which I wear in the winter). I'll be ordering more styles in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Matt k

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shoes, Just a Bit Pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. This is my fourth or fifth pair. They're very comfortable and appropriately styled to wear to the office. My only complaint is that they are kind of expensive and don't last as long as I think they should for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Eckhardt

customer_reviews.title: Another Hush Puppies Success
customer_reviews.text: I was dismayed when Hush Puppies discontinued my favorite shoe (Network), but I wanted to give this shoe a try because it kind of looks like the Network shoe, and the price was right. I was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable the shoes were right out of the box. I would recommend these shoes very highly.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Crittenden

customer_reviews.title: Noisy shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes started squeaking when I walked after a few months. Not wearable in a quiet office environment.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Kline

customer_reviews.title: "Gus" Hushpuppy shoes
customer_reviews.text: The "Gus" Hushpuppy shoes are comfortable and very light in weight. I ordered them a half size long and slightly wider in case my feet should swell on a hot day. The shoes are comfortable whether my feet are hot or cold. They appear to be durable shoes that should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great & comfortable shoe!! Feels good & light to the feet & legs!!
customer_reviews.author: Audie

customer_reviews.title: Out of this world comfort!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, my first pair lasted 11 years,and I where them in garden.This pair fit was tight in width and will take time to stretch. So light feet , you don't know you are wearing .
customer_reviews.author: RONNY-RULES65

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Look just like the picture in real life. I saw several comments saying that the shoes run wide, but my husband didn't think so, and he has a fairly narrow foot (we purchased an "M" width). Have to send them back though because they were a bit long in the toe (ordered size 10)--and that's the only reason for the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hay

customer_reviews.title: Very light, comfortable and well built.
customer_reviews.text: One of the lightest and most comfortable shoes my husband has. He got the Hush Puppies Gil Slip-On over a year ago and enjoyed them so much that he bought another pair last month and then decided to try the Gus Oxford which he bought using my account. He has not been disappointed so far, though he has only used this once. They are just as comfortable as the Gil Slip-On which he has used for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Fit pretty well, comfy and light
customer_reviews.text: My husband's only complaint about these shoes is that the width of the sole platform is a bit wide. When he walks our dog, our dog steps on the sole ledge and can cause trips. Our dog is being trained to heel tightly so this might not be a problem for other dog walkers. The price was great and he says the shoes are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Skyeisle

customer_reviews.title: My dawgs can breathe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for a great price. A tad large, but that's my fault for ordering a larger size and i just wear thick socks to make up the difference. Arch is pretty much nonexistent,but I wear supports anyway so that's no problem. Will be ordering another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Very good comfort, light and not bad price for Extra Wide shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, light weight, and fit great, needed extra wide shoes and these fit the bill exactly right, wear New Balance 10.5 3E normally and these 10.5 EW were perfect. I purchased snow weatherproof leather conditioner by Mr. Shoe Care for them at the same time, would recommend both for everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable, well made shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing 3 oe 4 days a week, and no complaints so far!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great, and works with orthotics
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought another pair on the one day sale. Every hush puppie shoe I've bought has been great. This is no exception. As I bonus, I use orthotics in my shoe, and they work perfectly. Buy a pair.
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Kauger

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Toes are tight. I expected them to be wider up front. But, they seem to be solid construction and have held up well with daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: JKHero

customer_reviews.title: Hush Puppies are still an amazing shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased when I saw that Hush Puppies are still being produced. I haven't had a pair for over 30 years and have missed them very much. They are still hands down the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. I almost want to order another three pair just in case they do stop making them!!! Craig, Lexington, KY
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG N. CARTER

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes! Very comfortable, and looks good with casual slacks or jeans when out on the town, shopping, visiting friends, etc... They are lightweight yet very sturdy and well built. I have to use orthotics in my shoes and these allow me to easily do that. I love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: FallingUpInOKC

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as their dress shoe
customer_reviews.text: This has been a disappointment. I bought Hush Puppy dress shoes which were great! They felt great from day one and did not need the customary break-in period that I have experienced with other shoes. I thought that I would buy these shoes for work where I walk a lot and am on my feet all day. These are uncomfortable and I am still looking for the best shoe for work. I may go back to a Sketchers shoe with some deep cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: EmAndEm

customer_reviews.title: Good source for Hush-Puppies
customer_reviews.text: Can't get them at local mall anymore, so I order them (3rd time.) Last about 18 months in good condition, then I just cycle them, throwing out the oldest, and keeping one pair for "work shoes." Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Semro

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these exact shoes for years. Would not consider anything else.
customer_reviews.author: john witherow

customer_reviews.title: Very goid
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I will use these shoes as most people would
customer_reviews.author: Tutor

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: For me, these shoes fit perfectly and they are very comfortable. They are super light-weight, have ample arch support, and look great, too. I highly recommend these shoes. I'm thinking seriously about buying a second pair of them in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Nice
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these, but they seem comfortable, and look nice. I will update my review if I run into any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Woundheir

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old Hush Puppie pair. Great quality as expected.
customer_reviews.author: John Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Sized small
customer_reviews.text: Had to return them...too short and too narrow compared the many pairs of Hush Puppies Mall Walkers I've purchased and worn for a decade and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Excell

customer_reviews.title: I could play tennis in these work shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and provide good support. They almost feel like tennis shoes, but are used as work shoes. Because I have narrow feet it is difficult to find shoes with correct width. These shoes fit my narrow feet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Lar

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I received my order today and I must say the shoes are well designed, comfortable, with perfect fit. I bought an 11 3E size and they fit to a T. To be recommended, thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Merksylvio

customer_reviews.title: Good, casual shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are my every other day shoes, only alternative between brown and black. For me they are perfect after a short break in period, always a little snug out of the box. Wear good, not great and the value is good also.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: make more hush puppies suede shoes
customer_reviews.text: it looks elegant, just what I need when dressed casually.
customer_reviews.author: FERNANDO ANTONIO

customer_reviews.title: not the best arch support which makes the lack of width more ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and wide and they could stand to be a little wider. Also, not the best arch support which makes the lack of width more noticeable. I keep wearing them, but I wouldn't recommend them to guys with big and wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: cherokee0014

product_meta.title: Hush Puppies Mens Gus Gus White Size: 6.5 UK
product_meta.description: Move over dad sneakers, grandpa's here. Our Gus lace-up leather sneakers are the perfect mash up of vintage-style men’s sneakers with classic oxfords. The comfortable fit on this pair will knock your socks off—discover the removable contoured footbed featuring a breathable mesh cover for additional cushioning and comfort. Plus, the durable ZeroG outsole on these sneakers is built with super lightweight materials designed to keep you on your feet with ease. Crafted in smooth leather ZeroG: Built with super-lightweight materials, this outsole keeps your feet at ease all day long Lace-up front Removable, contoured EVA footbed with an open cell mesh cover for additional cushioning Molded ZeroG lightweight outsole provides flexibility and traction PDAC approved
feature_bullets: Lace up closure for a secure fit
Padded collar and tongue for added support
Removable contoured cushion footbed for added comfort
Lightweight EPR Zero G rubber outsole helps absorb shock
